ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: No way to minimize cycle sidebar on mobile
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior When I open plane on my android phone and go to a cycle, the button to minimize the cycle sidebar is out of reach, making it unusable. This is the sidebar I'm referring to ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/357601/bbef185d-dfa0-4958-a854-2bfe02a2c352) This is the button that becomes unreachable ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/357601/2c741477-c264-4db9-aa23-bcff2035ce99) ### Steps to reproduce 1. go to a cycle on mobile, or just make your window narrow ### Browser Other ### Version Cloud
